oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hope - The Builder's Golden Rule
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Handwritten Hope Family entries (births, deaths, marriages) and architectural notes by Thomas Hope written in pages of [The Builder's Golden Rule by William Pain, 1782].
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Families; Architecture; Architects;
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Emma Hope Papers, Box 3: The Builder's Golden Rule
